docs.title: About
docs.text:
Daniel Kucharczyk is an Assistant Professor with the Faculty od Pure and Applied Mathematics at Wroclaw University of Technology. His research interests include the application of mathematics and AI/ML methods in:

  • finance,
  • remote sensing.

In addition he has been actively working in the following fields:

  • reproducible research,
  • scientific computing,
  • cloud software architecture.

docs.title: Machine Learning WUST 2024/2025
docs.text: Welcome to the official blog for the Machine Learning course at Wroclaw University of Technology. This site documents the teaching activities for graduate students in Applied Mathematics during the Winter Semester of 2024/2025.

docs.title: Week #1 - Introduction to Machine Learning
docs.text:
We hope you are all having fun and wish you all the best for the new year!
